message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I think you'll find very valuable. Given its features and benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget.
